title: Optimized Hotel Features
intro: The following list represents the optimized features of hotel Santo Stefano di Sessanio. The features were gathered from analyzing 1 company.

Architecture.title: Architecture
features: Carefully modernized by local architects while preserving the town's history (1)

Interior Design.title: Interior Design
features: Simple spaces with stone walls, wood ceilings, and fireplaces (1)

Originals.title: Authenticity Emphasis
features: Emphasis on authenticity and cultural value (1)

Location.title: Location
features: Santo Stefano di Sessanio, Italy - a historic European destination (1)

Rooms & Suites.title: Accommodation
features: 30 guestrooms spread along the narrow, cobblestone streets of the village (1)
